content.question: Portuguese commercial expansion overseas in the sixteenth century resulted in

choices.label: military conflicts with Arab explorers over the religious conversion of indigenous peoples
seizure of Muslim coastal forts to serve as Portuguese trading posts and military bases
the discovery of the Christian ruler of Ethiopia, Prester John
the sacking of Istanbul by Portuguese explorers
the destruction of the Dutch East India Company

content.answer: seizure of Muslim coastal forts to serve as Portuguese trading posts and military bases
